title: Understanding the ANA's Position
text: The American Nurses Association (ANA) has a clear stance on the involvement of nurses in physician-assisted suicide. Consider the ethical principles and standards that guide the nursing profession.

title: Ethical Principles in Nursing
text: Think about the core ethical principles that nurses are expected to uphold. How might these principles influence their participation in physician-assisted suicide?

hintAnswer: The American Nurses Association (ANA) states that nurses should not participate in assisted suicide, even in jurisdictions where it is legal, because it is inconsistent with the ethical principles and standards of the nursing profession
